These are CUTE! I ordered before reading the reviews and some of them had me scared! My daughter is 5’5”, 155lbs and roughly a size 8-10 or a L in women’s. I ordered her the XL and it fits well. It’s giving more old school jnko’s and less Christina Aguilara which I’m personally glad for but if you’re looking for a super sexy pant it’s not that. They feel like good quality pants.
